name: Ninja Slayer (SkyyFrost)
description:
Play as a ninja slayer which is blocked in the arena, to escape, he will have to defeat all waves of enemy ninja.
To do so, he will have the choice between 3 weapons which each have 4 powers as well as the power of the ninja slayer which allows him to become stronger when he kills a ninja.

This game is a suvival game in an arena with RPG mechanics.

The game has no sound so play your favorite musique on background
